response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase now, you can acquire this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 14000}
